meanings.sent1: The maze of hallways in the old building left me feeling pixilated.

meanings.sent3: His pixilated expression when faced with the new technology was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The pixilated map led us in circles, much like our confused thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The pixilated look on her face mirrored my own confusion perfectly.
